link.title: Governance : Security policies
link.description: Security management is a continuous process that is essential to keep businesses safe. Providing dynamic security controls without hindering the developer's productivity helps businesses control, defend, and extend their application. Providing access to service accounts with the right security policy is important, and Harness recommends PSP, OpenShift SCC, and Kyverno security policy templates.

customProps.description: HCE security policies such as PSP, Openshift SCC, and Kyverno
